author: breser
msg: Improve the formating codes used in svn_swig_pl_callback_thunk.  They
were using C types where they should have been using svn or apr types.
Helps with portability and fixes a problem on Windows.
(This change is based on their patches.)
(svn_swig_pl_callback_thunk): Change i format code to be apr_int32_t,
Drop the l format code, Add a u format code for apr_uint32_t,
Change L format code to be apr_int64_t, Add a r format code for
svn_revnum_t, Add a b format code for svn_boolean_t, change U
format code to use apr_uint64_t, add z format code for apr_size_t.
svn_swig_pl_blame_func):  Use the new format codes when appropriate.
* (io_handle_read, io_handle_write): Drop the logic in these functions
for detecting the size of apr_size_t and use the new format code that does

author: rooneg
msg: Adjust formatting and whitespace to better fit our style guidelines.
Most changes are adding the space-before-paren to function calls to fit with
the rest of the code in this directory, wrapping long lines, unwrapping lines
that do fit in 80 columns, using consistent if/else formatting, adding
whitespace around operators, and fixing some odd indenting.
(SVN_FS_FS__FILE, SVN_FS_FS__DIR): tweak whitespace to avoid line wrapping.

author: rooneg
msg: * configure.in: add a compatability macro for gettext in the !ENABLE_NLS case.

author: jpieper
msg: Implement enough of the libsvn_fs_fs filesystem reading routines so
that 'svn ls' on a simple test case succeeds.
(svn_fs_t): Add a field to store the fs_fs filesystem directory.
(svn_fs__node_revision_t): Add the following new fields to
support the fs_fs revision file format. (id, copyfrom,
that it can be used as a field.
(svn_fs_id_t): Add two new fields to support fs_fs, rev and
offset.  They let the filesystem efficiently locate any
(svn_fs_parse_id): Handle the new fields in svn_fs__id_t and
re-implemented to use apr_strtok for better error handling.
(svn_fs__things_different): Check for property and data changes
(merge): Compare properties using the fs_fs API.
Added more defines to represent the fs_fs revision file format.
and removed abort's on the control paths so implemented.
get_fs_id_at_offset, get_root_offset): New helper routines that
assist the above newly implemented functions.
